issue.title: Bump xunit from 2.4.0 to 2.4.1

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

repository.name: Polly
repository.description: Polly is a .NET resilience and transient-fault-handling library that allows developers to express policies such as Retry, Circuit Breaker, Timeout, Bulkhead Isolation, and Fallback in a fluent and thread-safe manner. From version 6.0.1, Polly targets .NET Standard 1.1 and 2.0+.

issue.body:
Bumps [xunit](https://github.com/xunit/xunit) from 2.4.0 to 2.4.1.
Commits
  • c54cc52 Fix generic oversight v2 (#1825)
  • 5959d74 #1816 Error message doesn't respect -nocolor option (#1824)
  • 975ff0c update msbuild extras (#1823)
  • e97b967 Pick up latest build-tools
  • be452a2 Fixes #1801: Remove the gratuitous netstandard2.0 libraries
  • eaeff26 Fix all the broken build things
  • ad20ed1 Drop back to .NET SDK 2.1.302 for AppVeyor
  • ffee51a Update to xunit.abstractions 2.0.3
  • 2ec6169 Add v2 branch to appveyor.yml
  • aa79468 Update NUnitXml.xslt to emit properties element before reason/failure (#1797)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=xunit&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.4.0&new-version=2.4.1)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: Updated xunit.execution with netstandard2.0 to avoid warnings with vulnerable packages

repository.name: xunit
repository.description: xUnit.net is a free, open source, community-focused unit testing tool for .NET.

issue.body:
See also #2470 and  #2294

Avoid these security warnings about vulnerable nuget-packages:

```
   [netcoreapp3.1]:
   Transitive Package                    Resolved   Severity   Advisory URL
   > System.Net.Http                     4.3.0      High       https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7jgj-8wvc-jh57
   > System.Text.RegularExpressions      4.3.0      Moderate   https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-cmhx-cq75-c4mj
```

When running this command for a solution that contains test-projects with xunit as dependency

`dotnet list ./src package --vulnerable --include-transitive`

Requires update of these packages:
- [xunit.extensibility.core](https://www.nuget.org/packages/xunit.extensibility.core/) v2.4.2 (Already have 2.4.2-pre.12)
- [xunit.extensibility.execution](https://www.nuget.org/packages/xunit.extensibility.execution/) v2.4.2 (Already have 2.4.2-pre.12)
- [xunit.core](https://www.nuget.org/packages/xunit.core/) v2.4.2 (Already have 2.4.2-pre.12)
- [xunit.assert](https://www.nuget.org/packages/xunit.assert/) v2.4.2 (Already have 2.4.2-pre.12)
- [xunit](https://www.nuget.org/packages/xunit/) v2.4.2 (Already have 2.4.2-pre.12)

issue.title: Multi-target xUnit 2 to .NET Standard 2.0

repository.name: xunit
repository.description: xUnit.net is a free, open source, community-focused unit testing tool for .NET.

issue.body:
The xUnit 2.x packages currently target .NET Standard 1.1, which results in an enormous amount of transitive dependecies being pulled even when the underlying framework does not need them.

To reduce these dependencies, [it is recommended to also target .NET Standard 2.0 if targeting .NET Standard 1.x](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/library-guidance/cross-platform-targeting). Until xUnit 3 releases, it would greatly help the users of 2.x.
